command_palette.title: Command Palette / Quick Search
command_palette.description: Trigger: ⌘K. Surface-2 bg. Input 16px. Results with diamond markers.

cookie_consent.title: Cookie Consent
cookie_consent.description: Fixed bottom, surface-2 bg, border-top. Accept All primary + Customize ghost.
cookie_consent.consent_text: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing, you agree to our cookie policy.

back_to_top.title: Back to Top
back_to_top.description: Fixed bottom-right. Visible after scroll >300px. Icon button style.

clipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard
clipboard.description: Idle: Copy icon. Click: ✓ + 'Copied!' green. Reset 2s. Used on code blocks, URLs.

dropdown.title: Dropdown Menu
dropdown.description: surface-2 bg. Hover: yellow bg tint + text. Danger: red variant. Section labels.

context_menu.title: Context Menu
context_menu.description: Same styling as Dropdown. Right-click trigger. Keyboard shortcut hints.

command-palette.onSelect: Callback when a result is selected

api.useCommandPalette: Hook with Cmd+K shortcut binding and focus management.

kbd.4: Cycle focus within the dialog (focus trap)

back-to-top.threshold: Scroll distance in px before button appears

copy-clipboard.resetDelay: Time in ms before resetting to idle state

dropdown.groups: Grouped menu items with optional section labels

context-menu.items: Context menu items with optional keyboard shortcut hints
context-menu.children: Target area that triggers context menu on right-click
